title: Ron Norris
text: Ron Norris (10 September 1932 - 7 November 1984) is an Indian <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201952%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Welterweight">men's welterweight</a> event at the <a href="1952%20Summer%20Olympics">1952 Summer Olympics</a>. He was the lightweight champion of Madhya Pradesh and won the All-India championship in 1952.
